content.question: A bag contains chips of which 27.5 percent are blue. A random sample of 5 chips will be selected one at a time and with replacement. What are the mean and standard deviation of the sampling distribution of the sample proportion of blue chips for samples of size 5 ?

choices.label: The mean is <math alttext="5 times 0.275" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>(</mo><mn>0.275</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the square root of 5 times 0.275 times 0.725, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>(</mo><mn>0.275</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>0.725</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The mean is 0.275, and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the square root of 5 times 0.275 times 0.725, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>(</mo><mn>0.275</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>0.725</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The mean is 0.275, and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the square root of the fraction 0.275 times 0.725 over 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.275</mn><mo>(</mo><mn>0.725</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The mean is 27.5, and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the square root of 5 times 27.5 times 72.5, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>(</mo><mn>27.5</mn><mo>)</mo><mo>(</mo><mn>72.5</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The mean is 27.5, and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the square root of the fraction 27.5 times 72.5 over 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>27.5</mn><mo>(</mo><mn>72.5</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The mean is 0.275, and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the square root of the fraction 0.275 times 0.725 over 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>0.275</mn><mo>(</mo><mn>0.725</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine parameters for probability distributions.
